statements: UPDATE building_blueprints SET architect_name = 'John Doe' WHERE blueprint_id = 1;
UPDATE building_blueprints SET blueprint_content = '{"floors": 10, "rooms": 50}' WHERE blueprint_id = 2;
UPDATE building_blueprints SET architect_name = 'John Doe', building_type = 'Commercial' WHERE blueprint_id = 1;
UPDATE building_blueprints SET blueprint_name = 'Residential Tower', blueprint_content = '{"floors": 20, "rooms": 50, "height": 200}' WHERE blueprint_id = 2;
UPDATE Architects SET name = 'John Smith', specialization = 'Residential' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Blueprints SET architect_id = 2, blueprint_name = 'House Design' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE Architects SET specialization = 'Urban Planning' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Blueprints SET blueprint_name = 'New Home Design', architect_id = 2 WHERE id = 5;

UPDATE Blueprints SET blueprint_date='2022-09-30' WHERE blueprint_id=5;

UPDATE architects SET architect_name = 'Frank Lloyd Wright' WHERE architect_id = 1;
UPDATE buildings SET location = 'New York' WHERE building_id = 2;
UPDATE architects SET architect_name = 'John Doe', architect_email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE architect_id = 1;
